hackathon-description-text: HackHolyoke is an inclusive 24 hour hackathon environment that encourages students to start and finish projects that fit within the judging categories. Submissions can be hardware-based, software-based, or both.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 year of GitHub Bronze plan (for the whole team-- redeem before 12/31/2016)
1 year of GitHub Bronze plan (for the whole team-- redeem before 12/31/2016)
1 year of GitHub Bronze plan (for the whole team-- redeem before 12/31/2016)
3 Jumping Sumo AR parrot drones (for the whole team)

hackathon-description-header: Demystifying misconceptions and increasing diversity in the field of CS .
